messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in 5 minutes.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Reminder to turn on your suit sensor, so we can save your ass

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Can i just say that the boys at med are now gods

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: JUST TO LET YOU KNOW, I HAVE ALL THE POWERS, BOW DOWN TO ME LIKE A GOD!!

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: No one cares, stop using the announcement if it's actually important

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Auxiliary Base Construction.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: So uhm... How do we explain this... It seems that Ian and Runtime mated... How the fuck did you guys even do that?

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: SUIT SENSORS FULL OR YOU ARE A MEGA LOSER!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: CMO GOING SSD FOREVER, I PUT THE VIROLOGIST IN CHARGE !!
